page.title: 09Shopping in Great Bromley
page.content: There are{no shops}in this area.{69%} of our survey{bought}their{bread}in {Colchester}, where they work. The rest travel to nearby villages.{90%}of our survey{bought stamps}at the{local} Post Office.{90%}of our survey{bought} their{clothes}and{furniture}in {Colchester}. The rest travel to {Ipswich}or order their goods through {mail order catalogues}. Only{14%}of our survey{bought}their{fruit and {vegetables}locally. This seems very low considering the number of local farms. Most people shop in Colchester. { 81%}of our survey{use}their{own cars} to go shopping because the{bus } {services}are so{infrequent.}
